## ğŸ“Œ Project Overview

This project analyzes railway delay patterns and train performance using MySQL.

The system helps identify:

* Most delayed stations
* Train performance ranking
* Revenue generated by trains
* Daily delay trends

* MySQL Workbench

* trains
* stations
* delay

## ğŸ“Š Advanced SQL Concepts Used

---

## ğŸ“ˆ Key Insights

* Dombivli is the most delayed station
* Superfast Express generated highest revenue
* Central Express is best performing train
* Delay trends vary across dates
